Torinubar is a master of the Asur art of Kineticism, the craft of focusing the wind of Qhaysh into kinetic energies that he can wield to either defend himself or crush his enemies.

Lord Karitamen's burning resentment and desire for revenge against the Border Princes who now occupy the lands that were once his domain fuel this skill.

Alphonse Dolmanc√©, an agent of pleasure and decadence, possesses a unique talent for blurring the lines between the extravagant and the humble. In his presence, even the lowly peasant units revel in the same ecstasy as their more exalted counterparts, fighting with newfound vigor on the battlefield.

When the battle reaches its zenith, Lord Slaurith succumbs to the intoxicating call of the Blood God. In this blood-fueled frenzy, he becomes immune to control but at the cost of his safety, making him a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefield.
